Others: Pittsburgh Pirates center fielder Oneil Cruz left the game against the Kansas City Royals with an ankle injury.
Cruz was replaced by Michael A. Taylor during the seventh inning.
Manager Derek Shelton stated that it was a precautionary move.
Cruz went 1-for-2 on the day with a walk.
There doesn't appear to be much concern regarding Cruz's long-term availability.
